author: PTI
title: Coronavirus | Iran-returned Indians shifted from Delhi to Jodhpur on IndiGo and SpiceJet aircraft
description: SpiceJet and IndiGo aircraft took 275 Indians evacuated from Iran to Jodhpur from Delhi on Sunday, Civil Aviation Minister Hardeep Singh Puri said.India is under a 21-day lockdown till April 14 to cur
content:
SpiceJet and IndiGo aircraft took 275 Indians evacuated from Iran to Jodhpur from Delhi on Sunday, Civil Aviation Minister Hardeep Singh Puri said.
India is under a 21-day lockdown till April 14 to curb the spread of the coronavirus and consequently, all int… [+837 chars]
